column2: April 9]], [[1949]]) is an Irish actress, the younger sister of [[wikipedia:Sinéad Cusack
column3: Sinéad Cusack]]. She played [[Goldberry]] in the two episodes of "The Adventures of Tom Bombadil", that were aired as part of [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)
column4: ''Tales from the Perilous Realm'' (1992 radio series)]].
